snippet.title: Atuel - Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Download Atuel for free now at https://matajuegos.itch.io/atuel

Atuel is a surrealist documentary game in which you traverse an oneiric landscape inspired by the topography and wildlife of the Atuel River, in Argentina. The game utilizes clips from interviews with locals, exploring our intimate and historic relationships with land and nature.

Atuel was being developed by Matajuegos in collaboration with The Twelve 01 Project.

Matajuegos is an Argentine game dev co-op dedicated to thinking and creating games from cultural, political, and artistic perspectives.

The Twelve 01 Project is an international documentary team dedicated to telling stories about environmental preservation. The game is a sister project to their own film documentary of the same name.

Atuel was recently nominated for the A MAZE 2022 Festival Awards in Berlin.

Matajuegos - https://matajuegos.itch.io/atuel
The Twelve 01 Project - https://www.the1201project.com/
A MAZE 2022 - https://2022.amaze-berlin.de/
Music by Makunouchi Bento - https://makunouchibento.bandcamp.com/
